original_text: “For the kingdom of heaven is like a master of a house who went out early in the morning to hire laborers for his vineyard.
korean_text: 천국은 마치 품꾼을 얻어 포도원에 들여보내려고 이른 아침에 나간 집 주인과 같으니

sentences.original_text: For the kingdom of heaven is like a master of a house
sentences.korean_translation: 하늘 나라는 어떤 집 주인과 같으니

sentences.original_text: who went out early in the morning
to hire laborers for his vineyard.
